item.title: 马杜罗与中国的 "完美联盟 "隐藏着深刻的经济裂痕
item.description: 被推翻的委内瑞拉领导人尼古拉斯-马杜罗可能比唐纳德-特朗普更能掏空中国在其经济中的存在。【原文：Ousted Venezuelan leader Nicolas Maduro may have done more to hollow out China’s presence in his economy than Donald Trump ever could.】

item.title: 香港豪宅以 1.33 亿美元售出，十年间增值 25
item.description: 香港著名的山顶区一栋豪宅以 10.4 亿港元（1.33 亿美元）的价格售出，为持有该豪宅约十年的业主带来了超过 25% 的收益。【原文：A mansion at Hong Kong’s prestigious Peak area was sold for HK$1.04 billion ($133 million), yielding a more than 25% gain for the owner who held it for about a decade.】

item.title: 沙特股市因对市场进一步自由化寄予厚望而攀升
item.description: 在沙特阿拉伯王国向所有外国投资者开放股票市场后，该国股市攀升，在这个海湾国家寻求促进海外投资之际，这一举措被视为实现市场全面自由化的关键。【原文：Saudi Arabian equities climbed after the kingdom opened up its stocks to all foreign investors, a step viewed as critical toward a full liberalization of the market as the Gulf nation looks to boost investment from abroad.】

item.title: 印尼今年可能没收 500 万公顷非法土地
item.description: 印度尼西亚计划再收回数百万公顷其认为被非法使用的土地，加强对其庞大的资源部门的监督。【原文：Indonesia plans to reclaim millions more hectares of land that it deems is being used illegally, intensifying a campaign to tighten oversight of its vast resources sector.】

item.title: 中国开始对日本芯片制造材料进行反倾销调查
item.description: 中国商务部在一份声明中说，中国对从日本进口的二氯硅烷发起反倾销调查，这是一种用于芯片制造工艺的材料。【原文：China launched an anti-dumping probe into imports from Japan of dichlorosilane, a material used in the chipmaking process, the Ministry of Commerce said in a statement.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧分销商请求法院阻止 23 亿美元的朝日交易
item.description: 法院文件显示，帝亚吉欧集团肯尼亚子公司的一家经销商要求东非国家的一家法院暂停向朝日集团控股有限公司出售股份的提议，以待早前一起案件的解决。【原文：A distributor of Diageo Plc’s Kenyan subsidiary asked a court in the East African nation to suspend a proposed share sale to Asahi Group Holdings Ltd. pending the resolution of an earlier case, court filings show.】

item.title: 竞争激烈、需求疲软，宜家将关闭中国七家门店
item.description: 宜家家居将关闭其在中国的七家标志性蓝盒子家具店，转而经营规模较小的门店，因为这家瑞典零售商正在努力应对中国房地产的长期低迷和本地竞争对手日益激烈的竞争。【原文：IKEA will shutter seven of its signature blue-box furniture stores across China and pivot to smaller outlets, as the Swedish retailer grapples with the country’s prolonged property slump and rising competition from local rivals.】

item.title: 中国的限制令日本别无选择，只能向美国寻求帮助
item.description: 日本对中国最新出口管制措施的反应很可能是谨慎的，这既反映出日本报复的选择有限，也反映出日本不希望与其最大贸易伙伴本已紧张的关系升级。【原文：Japan’s response to China’s latest export controls is likely to be cautious, reflecting both limited options for retaliation and a lack of appetite to escalate an already fraught relationship with its largest trading partner.】

item.title: 富时指数有望结束三日涨势
据说 Revolut 正在洽谈收购数字银行 FUPS，以在土耳其首次亮相
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Revolut 有限公司正在洽谈收购土耳其数字银行 FUPS，以便开始在该国提供服务。【原文：Revolut Ltd. is in talks to acquire Turkish digital bank FUPS to start offerings its services in the country, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 花旗和摩根大通以费用低为由退出 14 亿美元的 SBI 基金首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，华尔街一些最大的银行已经选择放弃为印度 SBI 基金管理有限公司计划中的 14 亿美元首次公开募股提供咨询，原因是费用太低。【原文：Some of Wall Street’s biggest banks have opted out of advising on a planned $1.4 billion initial public offering of India’s SBI Funds Management Ltd. because of low fees, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南非放宽法律以挽救受电力成本影响的企业
item.description: 南非放宽了反垄断规则，允许受高昂电力成本打击的行业的竞争者合作谈判更便宜的电力供应，以防止这些行业彻底崩溃，此举可能有助于该国濒临崩溃的铬铁行业。【原文：South Africa eased antitrust rules to allow competitors in industries hit by high power costs to cooperate on negotiating cheaper power supply in a bid to prevent their total collapse, a move that potentially helps the country’s ailing ferrochrome industry.】

item.title: 日股牛市无视中国紧张局势寻找买入机会
item.description: 尽管日本与中国的地缘政治紧张局势不断升级，但日本市场仍表现出韧性。【原文：Japanese markets are showing resilience despite the country’s escalating geopolitical tensions with China.】

item.title: 韩国总统李明博认为对日关系与对华关系同等重要
item.description: 韩国总统李在明（Lee Jae Myung）表示，韩国与日本的关系与与中国的关系同等重要，在北京向首尔示好的同时，他也在寻求平衡韩国的外交利益，而北京正因外交纠纷而向东京施加更大的压力。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae Myung said the country’s relations with Japan are as important as those with China, seeking to balance his country’s foreign interests at a time when Beijing is courting Seoul while turning up pressure on Tokyo over a lingering diplomatic dispute.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称雪佛龙和量子能源公司将竞购卢克石油公司资产
item.description: 据《金融时报》报道，雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）和私募股权集团量子能源合伙公司（Quantum Energy Partners）将联手收购受制裁的俄罗斯卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）的国际资产。【原文：Chevron Corp. and private equity group Quantum Energy Partners will join forces to buy the international assets of sanctioned Russian oil company Lukoil PJSC, according to the Financial Times.】

item.title: 科伦坡交易所因新股价格异常而停止交易
item.description: 科伦坡证券交易所（Colombo Stock Exchange）在注意到财富信托证券有限公司（Wealth Trust Securities Ltd.）将于周三上市的股票 "开盘价异常 "后停止了交易。【原文：The Colombo Stock Exchange halted trading after noticing “unusual opening prices” in shares of Wealth Trust Securities Ltd. that were to debut on Wednesday.】

item.title: 棕榈油因出口强劲和产量下降而上涨
item.description: 棕榈油上涨，因为投资者希望马来西亚的装运量反弹，产量进一步下降，尽管世界第二大种植国不断膨胀的库存限制了棕榈油的涨幅。【原文：Palm oil rose as investors hoped for a rebound in Malaysian shipments and further production declines, although swelling stockpiles in the world’s second-largest grower capped gains.】

item.title: 南非股票市值升至 2019 年以来最高点
item.description: 兰特的走强和金属价格的飙升使南非基准股票指数的市值达到了 2019 年以来的最高点。【原文：Rand strength and soaring metal prices have bolstered the capitalization of South Africa’s benchmark equity index to the highest since 2019.】

item.title: 中国在与日本的纷争中肩负起其最喜爱的贸易战武器
item.description: 稀土是中国在贸易冲突中最喜欢使用的武器，中国向日本发出的可能切断稀土供应的警告，针对的是日本制造商十多年来一直存在的弱点，即东京一直试图减少对竞争对手的依赖。【原文：China’s warning to Japan that it could choke off supplies of rare earths, its favorite weapon in trade conflicts, targets a persistent vulnerability among Japanese manufacturers after more than a decade of Tokyo trying to reduce reliance on its rival.】

item.title: 特朗普称莫迪对关税不满，削减俄罗斯石油进口量
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普称，由于华盛顿对南亚国家征收高额关税，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪对他不满，这是两国关系持续紧张的最新迹象。【原文：US President Donald Trump said Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi was unhappy with him due to Washington’s high tariffs on the South Asian nation, the latest sign of continued strain between the two countries.】

item.title: 中国在最新监管措施中瞄准在线商务战
item.description: 中国周三公布了禁止阿里巴巴集团（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）等大型平台胁迫网络商家进行促销的广泛规定，这是为给迅速加剧的电子商务竞争降温而采取的一系列新措施之一。【原文：China unveiled broad regulations Wednesday that ban major platforms such as Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. from coercing online merchants into promotions, one of a raft of new measures intended to cool rapidly intensifying e-commerce competition.】

item.title: 日本的债券寡妇终于迎来了自己的日子
item.description:
收益率达到 1999 年以来的最高水平，并在高市领导下加速增长。【原文：

Yields are their highest since 1999 and accelerating under Takaichi.

】

item.title: 炼油厂关闭后，瓦莱罗公司将增加加州的燃油进口量
item.description: 瓦莱罗能源公司（Valero Energy Corp. ）预计将增加旧金山湾区的汽油进口量，该公司正在推进关闭该地区一家炼油厂的计划，但暂时不会完全退出北加州。【原文：Valero Energy Corp. is expecting to increase gasoline imports to the San Francisco Bay Area, as the company moves forward with plans to close a refinery in the region but stops short of fully exiting Northern California for now.】

item.title: 泰国央行强调政策必须从中期角度出发
item.description: 已将利率降至2022年以来最低点的泰国央行周三表示，它对货币政策持中期观点，以防范金融体系面临的意外风险，并为进一步放宽政策保留有限的空间。【原文：The Bank of Thailand, which has slashed interest rate to the lowest since 2022, said Wednesday that it takes a medium-term view of monetary policy to safeguard against unforeseen risks to the financial system and preserve its limited space for further easing.】

item.title: 百度人工智能芯片部门昆仑万维据说将为 20 亿美元的香港 IPO 挑选银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，百度公司的人工智能芯片部门已聘请银行在香港进行首次公开募股，募集资金可能高达 20 亿美元。【原文：Baidu Inc.’s artificial-intelligence chip unit has hired banks for an initial public offering in Hong Kong that may raise as much as $2 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中日新出口限制令亚洲稀土库存攀升
item.description: 中国禁止向日本出口军用品，此举有可能挤压供应链，随后整个亚太地区与稀土相关的股票都上涨了。【原文：Rare earth-related shares gained across the Asia-Pacific region after China imposed a ban on exports of military-use items to Japan, a move with the potential to squeeze supply chains.】

item.title: 受中国人民银行展望和补货影响，铁矿石创 2 月份以来新高
item.description: 受中国宏观经济支持前景和节前补货的提振，铁矿石连续第四天上涨。【原文：Iron ore rose for a fourth day, buoyed by the outlook for macro-economic support in China and pre-holiday restocking.】

item.title: 中国股市成交量跃升预示 2026 年反弹仍将继续
item.description: 中国的股票交易量攀升至四个月来的最高水平，这表明 2026 年初的股市反弹还有进一步的空间。【原文：China’s stock trading volume climbed to the highest level in four months, suggesting the equity rally at the start of 2026 has further to run.】

item.title: 日本制造商面临中国出口限制的新威胁
item.description: 中国禁止向日本出口可能用于军事用途的产品，标志着两国外交争端的升级，可能会扰乱全球高科技零部件供应链。【原文：China’s ban on exports of products with potential military use to Japan marks an escalation in the diplomatic spat between the countries that could disrupt global supply chains for high-tech components.】

item.title: 德意志银行在 2025 年印度美元债券交易中名列前茅
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）在外币债务发行放缓的情况下，取代渣打银行，自 2007 年以来首次获得为印度借款人安排美元债券的头把交椅。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG clinched the top slot arranging dollar bonds for Indian borrowers for the first time since 2007, taking over from Standard Chartered Bank as foreign currency debt issuance slowed.】
